title: Wake Up, Bear!
description: Bear has slept all winter long. Now winter is over, and spring has begun. Will she finally wake up and explore the forest? Wake Up, Bear! is a charming story filled with detailed illustrations and engaging, repetitive text to support emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to sequence events as well as connect to prior knowledge to better understand the story.
reviewWords: awake, bear, den, sleepy, spring, winter
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /b/ sound
grammar: Exclamatory Sentences                : Identify and use exclamatory sentences
